meta.title: POE2 League Starter Campaign Guide - Master Info Sheet
meta.purpose: Running reference database for cross-checking the one-page campaign guide. Based on user-provided Maxroll summaries + previously gathered external notes; items requiring verification are flagged.
notes: This file is intended to be re-uploaded/pasted into future chats to restore context.
Fields marked 'verification_flag' should be validated against primary sources (GGG patch notes / in-game) when available.
2025-12-12: Added campaign progression section common-level ranges table (v1) + build overlay data-format templates.
meta.campaign_section_rule: Hub sections may imply subzones; implied subzones are not standalone sections.

campaign_structure.full_release_note: Per user-provided walkthrough summary: full release planned as 6 acts with no interludes.

leveling_breakpoints.details: Look for 'Runner’s' prefix; transmute boots aggressively; augment magic boots without a prefix.

leveling_breakpoints.upgrade: Ruby Ring / Attribute amulets / Flask charges
Flask upgrade (Colossal) / 20% MS boots / Spirit amulet

reward_notes: Uncut Skill Gem Level 1 (Reaching Clearfell)
Permanent buff: +10% Cold Resistance (Head of the Winter Wolf)
Abandoned Stash: Uncut Skill Gem L1
Quest reward: Uncut Support Gem L1

zones.zone: The Grelwood / The Red Vale / Tree of Souls
reward_notes: Areagne: Uncut Support Gem L1; her Cauldron: Medium Life & Mana Flask
Rust King: Runed Girdles -> Runed Spikes (return to Renly)
Use Runed Spikes at Tree of Souls
Uncut Support Gem L1
Ancient Ruins: guaranteed Iron Ring or Lazuli Ring
Key pieces -> Memorial Gate -> Count Lachlann’s Ring
Book: +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Gembloom Skull: +30 Spirit + Uncut Spirit Gem (level per summary)
Charm choice (Sapphire recommended in provided summary)
Book: +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points (Lost Lute)
Unlock Salvage Bench (first character) via Renley’s tools
Secret chest: Artificer’s Orb + Blank Rune
Uncut Support Gem L1 (secret)
Candlemass’ Essence: +20 Maximum Life
Fire resistance recommended; frees Risu
Barya for Trial of the Sekhemas (Ascendancy)
Ascendancy unlock (touch altar)
Book: +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Secret: guaranteed Magic Amulet
Resistance ring choice (Ruby recommended); Essence of Water; Uncut Support Gem

zones.zone: Valley of the Titans / Titan Grotto
reward_notes: Place Sun + Kabala relics at Relic Altar near waypoint; changeable permanent relic buff; Uncut Support Gem
Secret: Titan's Sword (guaranteed Lesser Rune)
Deliver Final Letter to Shambrin: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Sisters of Garukhan shrine: +10% Lightning Resistance
End of Act 2
Lesser Jeweller’s Orb (high priority)
Hanging Tree secret: Magic Ring
Book: +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Permanent buff choice (cannot be changed): examples include stun threshold / ailment threshold / mana regen
Gemrot Skull: +30 Spirit + Uncut Spirit Gem (level per summary)
Optional: Flameskin Ritual temp fire res
Inscribed Ultimatum for Trial of Chaos (Ascendancy)
Soul core puzzle; Flame Core: +10% Fire Resistance
Large Soul Core
Reforging Bench unlock (first character); time pressure mechanic
Shade mechanic to avoid stacking burn
Use Sacrificial Heart: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
End of Act 3 -> unlock Act 4
Rog: disenchanting; Tujen: gamble; Ange: async trading/hideout/currency exchange (per walkthrough)
Strategy note: doing Whakapanu early can unlock hideout/currency exchange/async trading (per summary)
Goddess of Justice: +30% Life OR Mana Flask Recovery (changeable)
Silent Hall: +5% Maximum Mana permanent buff
Blank Tattoos: permanent +5 Attribute or +5% Resist choices
Book reward attribution flagged (see verification flags)
Delirium distilled emotions for instilling amulet (per summary)
Blind Beast: Blank Greater Rune (per provided summary). Weapon-set points from Blind Beast are flagged for verification due to known 0.4 changes in other notes.
Activate six Megaliths
Consume Warden's Ledger: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points
Optional quest: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points (from Risu in summary)
Skullmaw Stairway: Molten One’s Gift -> +5% Maximum Life
Optional: Yoon's Barya / Rangeen's Barya -> choice of Rare Ring/Amulet/Jewel
Changeable permanent buff (examples listed: 12% CDR, 3% MS, 5% XP)
Sacred Wells reward (Exalt + Alch) is flagged for verification
Uncut Skill Gem Level 14
Gemcrust Skull: +40 Spirit + Uncut Spirit Gem Level 14
Icy Tusks: Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points (from Hilda in summary)
One free Unique item (per summary)
Quest: 'Siege of Oriath' -> Book +2 Weapon Set Passive Skill Points (per summary)

crafting_and_currency: Runes are the strongest campaign crafting tool (weapon damage runes; armor resistance runes).
Salvage all socketed and quality gear you aren’t using.
Early: prioritize gold to buy key bases/flasks/jewelry; later mix in disenchanting for shards.
Use Transmutes freely; Augments sparingly; Regals on strong 2-mod magic items; Alchs sparingly on an up-to-date weapon or long-term utility item.
survival: Keep moving; run circles around enemies; 'hug the boss' for easier dodging.
Resist cap matters greatly; target specific resistances for known upcoming bosses.

attributes: Respec flexible attribute nodes (small gold cost)
Grab bonus attribute nodes if needed
mana: Use charge regen suffix for bosses
Mana on kill for clearing; leech is supplemental early

qol_and_tech: CTRL+Click shortcut to NPC interactions (e.g., identify all).
Checkpoints: teleport to discovered checkpoints; respawn-at-checkpoint can reset zones.
Movement skills via temporary mace/shield + uncut gem (Leap Slam / Shield Charge); weapon swap passives can temporarily allocate STR nodes; dodge-roll to animation-cancel landing.

verification_flags.item: Act 4 - Blind Beast reward includes +2 weapon-set points
verification_flags.reason: User-provided walkthrough summary claims points + Blank Greater Rune; other external notes indicate 0.4 moved the tome to Dark Mists/Omniphobia. Verify against patch notes/in-game.

verification_flags.item: Act 4 - Halls of the Dead: Navali grants +2 weapon-set points
verification_flags.reason: User-provided summary attributes points to Navali; external notes suggest reward tied to Trial completion; verify.

verification_flags.item: Interlude 2 - Sacred Wells guarantee Exalted Orb + Orb of Alchemy
verification_flags.reason: Often reported inconsistently; treat as unconfirmed until validated.

verification_flags.item: Interlude 2 - Orbala's Pillar exact boon options
verification_flags.reason: User-provided list may be incomplete/variable; verify.

verification_flags.description: Act 4 section levels include Kingsmarch at 53-54 while nearby Act 4 zones are 46-48; verify Act 4 order/area levels vs in-game.

campaign_progression_sections.description: Ordered campaign guide sections (as used in the website guide) with common player level ranges for each section. Intended to be build-agnostic; build overlays can insert milestones/checklists into these sections.
